game

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board is a class that holds lokums in two dimensional lokum array and it also operates logic actions(like fill empty spaces, eat, swap...) of game

      • calculateCombinationScore

        public int calculateCombinationScore(Combination c)
        This method takes a combination as a argument and calculates that combinations score by looking the all cases that combination can be. Measurements based on project requirements.
        Parameters:
        c - The combination which's score will be counted.
        Returns:
        returns score of that combination.

      • swap

        public void swap(Lokum a,
                 Lokum b)
        It replaces the coordinate x and y of lokum a with the coordinate x and y of lokum b.
        Parameters:
        a - First selected lokum for swap.
        b - Second selected lokum for swap.

      • unswap

        public void unswap(Lokum a,
                   Lokum b)
        It replaces the coordinate x and y of lokum a with the coordinate x and y of lokum b.
        Parameters:
        a - First selected lokum for swap.
        b - First selected lokum for swap.

      • eatAllLokums

        public void eatAllLokums()
        It eats the all lokums in the board. It can be done by swapping two color bombs.

      • eatWrapped

        public void eatWrapped(int locX,
                       int locY)
        It used at eat of a wrapped lokum.
        Parameters:
        locX - The X location of bomb lokum
        locY - The Y location of bomb lokum

      • eatAllSameType

        public void eatAllSameType(Lokum lokum)
        It eats the all same type of lokums in the board. It can be done by swapping a color bomb and a normal lokum.
        Parameters:
        lokum - Lokum that will be eaten all over the board

      • changeAllLokumType

        public void changeAllLokumType(Lokum lokum)
        It changes the all lokum types in the board. It can be done by swapping a color bomb and a striped lokum.
        Parameters:
        lokum - The lokum that will be changed
        type - The type that lokum will changed into
